text:
I love Julia's workflow for continuous delivery: 1) increment version number 2) `@JuliaRegistrator register`, 3) TagBot does its thing.
My usual Python workflow is: 1) increment version number 2) manually tag release 3) manually build wheels 4) manually upload wheels to PyPi. Julia spoiled me. Does anyone have a nice workflow for continuous delivery for Python packages?

text: Julia used to be a pain like Python also.  It’s so much nicer now!
